nodes.text: The Secrets of the Jedi was a book chronicling the history of the Jedi Order written by the Jedi Master Luke Skywalker during his self-imposed exile on the planet Ahch-To, home of the First Jedi Temple. He recorded what he knew of the Jedi and their ways all the way up to his encounter with Rey, a young woman who sought his training in the Jedi ways and help in a conflict against the First Order, shortly before Skywalker became one with the Force.
